name: serverless-wso2-apim
description: Serverless Framework plugin for WSO2 API Manager

scripts.test:e2e:setup: echo "***** Make sure Docker daemon is running.. *****" && docker stop /api-manager-260 && docker stop /api-manager-320 && concurrently --kill-others true "docker run --name api-manager-260 -p 127.0.0.1:8260:8243 -p 127.0.0.1:9260:9443 --rm wso2/wso2am:2.6.0" "docker run --name api-manager-320 -p 127.0.0.1:8320:8243 -p 127.0.0.1:9320:9443 --rm wso2/wso2am:3.2.0"
scripts.test:e2e:killall: echo "***** Make sure Docker daemon is running.. *****" && docker stop /api-manager-260 & docker stop /api-manager-320 & docker rm /api-manager-260 & docker rm /api-manager-320

author: Ram Grandhi <ram.grandhi@icloud.com> (https://ramgrandhi.com)
